description:
Jesse Bernheim, Attorney at Law, in Jacksonville, Florida, provides exceptional representation to clients across his region who suffered a serious injury or loss as the result of someone else's negligent, careless or unlawful actions. With an additional office in Starke, his law firm has grown into one of Florida's leading personal injury practices, and he promises to fight hard to protect your rights and entitlements and to increase your chances of obtaining the justice you deserve.

Prior to establishing his own legal practice, Mr. Bernheim served as a founding partner of Bernheim Kelley Battista and Bliss, LLC, which has law offices throughout Florida and Massachusetts. Over the course of his legal career, he has gained a reputation as a leader in personal injury law. He has recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for his plaintiff clients with their complex legal challenges involving any of the following:

  • Medical device and pharmaceutical litigation
  • Product liability
  • Tobacco litigation
  • First-party insurance litigation
  • Workplace accidents

Some of Mr. Bernheim's most notable successes include a $54 million recovery for the victim of a defective hip product as well as a $21 million verdict on behalf of a widow whose husband died from smoking. He has also secured many other settlements and verdicts well in excess of a million dollars. From his success, he has earned a membership in the Million Dollar Advocates Forum, and he has received consistent top rankings and endorsements from his peers for being among the nation's top personal injury lawyers.

To speak with Mr. Bernheim about your claim at no cost, you can contact his law office, Jesse Bernheim, Attorney at Law, to schedule a free case evaluation. He also currently offers virtual consultations to help keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy in these uncertain times.
